definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
all roads lead to Rome/use different means to obtain the same result (idiom)
pinyin: tiao2 tiao2 da4 lu4 tong1 Luo2 ma3

sentences.english: Farmers didn't have to scrambled to plant common vegetables this year.
sentences.chinese: 今年農民不再一窩蜂似的種大路菜了。

sentences.english: You should not give up though you failed the exam. All roads lead to Rome.
sentences.chinese: 即使你考試失敗，也不要氣餒，條條大路通羅馬。

sentences.english: And I will make all my mountains a way, and my highways shall be exalted.
sentences.chinese: 我必使我的衆山成爲大道，我的大路也被修高。

sentences.english: This supercilious attitude relegates me to the level of the commonplace.
sentences.chinese: 這種目空一切的心態把我歸入大路貨的檔次。

sentences.english: Beilun District of Ningbo City, the new road No. 555, we did what?
sentences.chinese: 寧波市北侖區新大路555號，我們做過什麼？

sentences.english: If you come, the tiger will bite you.
sentences.chinese: 你會走大路還是抄小路避開老虎？

sentences.english: Follow the main road until it branches, and then turn to the right.
sentences.chinese: 順著這條大路走，在路的分岔口向右拐。

sentences.english: Whenever the grass was dry the children would cut across me fields instead of keeping to the road.
sentences.chinese: 每當草木枯乾時，孩子們寧走荒野也不去走大路。

sentences.english: And life's long night is ended, and he way Lies open onward to eternal day.
sentences.chinese: 生命的漫漫長夜已盡，大路開展，奔向永恆的白日。

sentences.english: The hotel is conveniently located at the junction of Jingyang Road and West Ring Road right in the center of Luyuan District.
sentences.chinese: 酒店地處於綠園區中心的景陽大路與西環城路交匯處。

sentences.english: The road to the coast branches off from the main road in about a mile.
sentences.chinese: 通往海邊的路從大路岔開約一英里左右。

sentences.english: He is on the highroad to success.
Every day they went to the road nearby and stood there begging.
sentences.chinese: 他們每天到附近的大路上去，站在那裏要飯。

sentences.english: We walked past cars and auto parts that had been abandoned in the woods, far from any road.
sentences.chinese: 我們走過被丟棄在遠離大路的林中的和汽車部件。

sentences.english: This is the third interview in a series entitled The Many Paths to Translation Work.
sentences.chinese: 本文是“條條大路通翻譯”人物專訪的第三篇。

sentences.english: Sunbury was passed through, and they came again into the lonely road.
sentences.chinese: 桑伯雷過去了，他們重新駛上荒涼的大路。

definition: road as twisty as sheep's intestine (idiom); narrow and winding road/fig. complicated and tricky job
bypath/trail/bribery as a means of achieving a goal/minor arts (Confucian reference to agriculture, medicine, divination, and other professions unworthy of a gentleman)
